a secure, sovereign system of data sharing in which all participant can realize the full value of their data. The International Data Spaces (IDS) initiative aim at cross-sectoral data sovereignty and data interoperability. It set forth a Reference Architecture Model basing on open standard and contributing to global standards. By specifying data usage constraints, it defines the term and condition for the data economy and by describing an open software architecture and publishing open source software code it ensures maximum adoption. IDSA is also an integral part of GAIA-X which is aiming at a Federated Data Infrastructure for European ecosystems. IDSA is offering the following: Contribute knowledge and technology to the envisaged high impact project on European data spaces; Provide data infrastructure service to the operation of the nine European data space through it support organization; Provide advisory, knowledge and expertise to the European Data Act Provide a community of practice and a network of hub and collaboration to support knowledge sharing and build up required skill in the data economy across Europe and beyond European borders. INTERNATIONAL DATA SPACES The future of the data economy is here What we do and why it matter The International Data Spaces Association (IDSA) is on a mission to create the future of the global, digital economy with International Data Spaces (IDS), a secure, sovereign system of data sharing in which all participant can realize the full value of their data. IDS enables new smart service and innovative business process to work across company and industry while ensuring that the self-determined control of data use (data sovereignty) remains in the hand of data providers. Whats going on Open Month: In May we are opening up our weekly members-only call for everybody! Explore the essence of our full spectrum of activity Stay up-to-date with the latest development in data connector Explore the most crucial storiesin the data economy! Join IDSA activity to drive change in sovereign data sharing! Emil-Figge-Str. 80 44227 Dortmund, Germany Phone:+49 (0)231 70096 501 2016 2024 | All Rights Reserved | International Data Spaces Association | | | | Follow u Follow u Follow u Follow u Learn more aiXia aiXia" which will be led by LANTEK (digital services) together with the company LIS SOLUTIONS | S.L. (data analytics and ai services) | INGETEAM, S.A.(energy) | GOIZPER S.COOP. (machine-tool industry) | MONDRAGON ASSEMBLY S.COOP. (manufacturing) | UBIKARE ZAINKETAK, S.L. (healthcare) | EROSKI S.COOP (retail) | The technology coordinator is IKERLAN (a leading knowledge transfer center providing competitive value to companies) SUCCESS: Seeks to promote and research the necessary technology for the definition of a reference architecture, operational models, adoption of standard and development for a data space based on the common technical framework proposed by DSBA members, extending it main service to favor the development of artificial intelligence with guarantee of traceability, security, and governance of the data and services. BENEFITS: Aims to provide the country with a reliable data space that enables company to offer new concept of high-added value service based on data sharing, through the servitization of collaborative artificial intelligence for the productization and monetization of their data and industry knowledge in new business models. COMPONENTS: Will develop new service in the field of artificial intelligence and will explore current IDS component implementation (focusing on Connectors, Metadatabroker, and IdentityProviders) in order to select one of them to rely on. LEARN MORE: MONDRAGON ASSEMBLY EGOKIA MONDRAGON ASSEMBLY - an international firm specializing in the development of automatization and assembly solution for various sectors. It operates 6 production plant around the world and is part of the largest cooperative group in the world | IKERLAN Technical research center and member of IDSA CHALLENGE: EGOKIA solution allows collaborative learning and knowledge sharing between geographically distributed plants, integrating headquarters in Basque Country and domain experts. Thanks to the data space, data, and AI asset can be securely shared throughout different corporate site and a new knowledge-based economy emerges. SUCCESS: Deploys an architecture based on IDSA connectors, linking Mondragon Assemblys data and AI platform from different corporate sites. With this new reliable data space, we extend the lifecycle of artificial intelligence models, enhance their capabilities, and facilitate trusted access and use of it asset by EGOKIA participants. BENEFITS: NEW BUSINESS MODEL: A new business model based on AI service and a knowledge-based economy. RELIABLE AI SOLUTIONS: A "standardized", flexible, and secure solution to break data silo to share and complete AI asset and process between trusted organization and production plants. Measurable benefit can be listed as: Up to 30% quality on model thanks to the application of federated learning techniques, reduce inversion and time to market on IA-based solution or lower communication loads. STANDARIZED DATA SPACE The organization is ready to take part in the knowledge economy with other entities, domain experts, and technology providers. COMPONENTS: Data Space connector 8.0.2 Metada Broker 5.0.3 Identity Provider 1.6.0 Gaia-X4KI A sovereign data and service ecosystem for artificial intelligence in automotive development, production, and operation DLR | T-Systems | Capgemini Engineering | Continental | IAV | Intel | Conweaver | HighQSoft | Reuschlaw | STTech | Fraunhofer ITWM | Fraunhofer ISST | Hochschule Offenburg | Leibniz Universitt Hannover | Technische Hochschule Ingolstadt CHALLENGE: Autonomous driving scenario and the industrial production of required device face a broad range of challenge related to data sovereignty and security. In particular, transfer of large, sensitive file and service in a policy-conform way are addressed in the prototypes. SUCCESS: The solution are cloud-based and are embedded in existing industrial cloud landscape to enhance data sovereignty of participant in complex data exchange relations. BENEFITS: Gaia-X4KI connects various stakeholder and their diverse system landscape from the complete autonomous driving development lifecycle. COMPONENTS: Eclipse Dataspace Components (EDC) and EDC MVD including Connector, Federated Catalog, Identity Hub, Registration Service PREREQUISITES: The data space is currently in development and being tested inside the project. It base on open source components. LEARN MORE: Introduction IKERLAN is a leading knowledge transfer technological centre providing competitive value to companies. We seek for excellence in R&D&i, thanks to the continuous adaptation to the need of our customer and the proximity with the business reality. Faithful to our mission, we have been working daily since 1974 to develop solution that allow our customer to become more and more competitive. We are a cooperative member of the MONDRAGON Corporation and the Basque Research and Technology Alliance (BRTA). Business Expertise Thanks to a unique cooperation model, which combine technology transfer activities, internal research and training of highly qualified personnel, IKERLAN is currently the trusted technological partner of major company in the country. To meet our goal, we are structured into two technological specialization units: ELECTRONICS, INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATION TECHNOLOGIES ENERGY AND MECHATRONICS IKERLAN is a center that is dynamic and open to the world. We are an accredited agent of the Basque Network of Science, Technology, and Innovation and of the Spanish Federation of Technology Centres. We have a major cooperation network integrated with renowned European center and universities, with which we conduct activity of research and training of researchers. Technical Expertise Mission: To solve the technological challenge of the companies, improve their competitiveness and collaborate with the sustainable social and economic development of the environment, all of that from a position of technological leadership and with differential ability in their area of expertise. Vission: Technological center, cooperative and non-profit, known a the European leader in it area of specialization, with an exceptional cohesive human team, that provides value to the company and society. Contact Details Santiago Charramendieta Website Increased visibility of order delivery process VTT | Wrtsil | Uwira CHALLENGE: The use case revolves around expediting and enhancing transparency between a focal company of a manufacturing ecosystem (OEM) and it supplier in their production order management processes. The existing communication method have proven inadequate in facilitating efficient and adaptable exchange between the two entities. By facilitating transparency and fostering a more seamless integration between the IT system of both companies, the management of product order can be streamlined, resulting in heightened efficiency and a reduction in errors. SUCCESS: The objective is to facilitate a reliable and seamless flow of data between the OEM and it supplier by establishing a dedicated data space. The developed solution will be seamlessly integrated with pre-existing IT infrastructure of both company and the solution is grounded in the framework of the IDS reference architecture. The OEM can selectively disclose data from their production environment to the supplier without the fear of data leakages. Respectively, the supplier receives only the data that are essential for them and there is no need to locally extract meaningful insight and valuable information from big data sets. BENEFITS: The established data space solution ha the potential to significantly enhance transparency between the OEM and the supplier. This give rise to several potential benefits, including: Effective Communication: Transparent communication help in conveying accurate information about product specifications, requirements, changes, and timelines. Risk Management: Sharing information about potential risks, such a change in demand or design modifications, allows supplier to proactively address these issues. Furthermore, in time of disruptions, such a supply shortage or unexpected market shifts, transparent communication help both party respond more effectively. Cost Efficiency: Transparent communication allows both party to work together to find cost-effective solutions. COMPONENTS: IDS connector - serve a the communication interface linking the two company and their existing IT systems. With IDS connectors, a data provider can define the rule and condition (usage policies) under which data are shared with a data consumer. DAPS - enables connector to authenticate themselves using X.509 certificates. After successful authentication, the DAPS issue OAuth2 access token for connectors, who need these token to access the service and data of other connectors. Metadata Broker store information about the data end-points offered by the participants. The broker provides a query interface for connector and can hence be considered a the search engine in this use case. LEARN MORE: IDSA Newsroom Explore our newsroom Stay informed and connected with the latest update from IDSA. Dont miss out on development in the world of data space and the data economy. Technical Expertise Mission: To solve the technological challenge of the companies, improve their competitiveness and collaborate with the sustainable social and economic development of the environment, all of that from a position of technological leadership and with differential ability in their area of expertise. Vission: Technological center, cooperative and non-profit, known a the European leader in it area of specialization, with an exceptional cohesive human team, that provides value to the company and society. Contact Details Santiago Charramendieta Website Increased visibility of order delivery process VTT | Wrtsil | Uwira CHALLENGE: The use case revolves around expediting and enhancing transparency between a focal company of a manufacturing ecosystem (OEM) and it supplier in their production order management processes. The existing communication method have proven inadequate in facilitating efficient and adaptable exchange between the two entities. By facilitating transparency and fostering a more seamless integration between the IT system of both companies, the management of product order can be streamlined, resulting in heightened efficiency and a reduction in errors. SUCCESS: The objective is to facilitate a reliable and seamless flow of data between the OEM and it supplier by establishing a dedicated data space. The developed solution will be seamlessly integrated with pre-existing IT infrastructure of both company and the solution is grounded in the framework of the IDS reference architecture. The OEM can selectively disclose data from their production environment to the supplier without the fear of data leakages. Respectively, the supplier receives only the data that are essential for them and there is no need to locally extract meaningful insight and valuable information from big data sets. BENEFITS: The established data space solution ha the potential to significantly enhance transparency between the OEM and the supplier. This give rise to several potential benefits, including: Effective Communication: Transparent communication help in conveying accurate information about product specifications, requirements, changes, and timelines. Risk Management: Sharing information about potential risks, such a change in demand or design modifications, allows supplier to proactively address these issues. Furthermore, in time of disruptions, such a supply shortage or unexpected market shifts, transparent communication help both party respond more effectively. Cost Efficiency: Transparent communication allows both party to work together to find cost-effective solutions. COMPONENTS: IDS connector - serve a the communication interface linking the two company and their existing IT systems. With IDS connectors, a data provider can define the rule and condition (usage policies) under which data are shared with a data consumer. DAPS - enables connector to authenticate themselves using X.509 certificates. After successful authentication, the DAPS issue OAuth2 access token for connectors, who need these token to access the service and data of other connectors. Metadata Broker store information about the data end-points offered by the participants. The broker provides a query interface for connector and can hence be considered a the search engine in this use case. LEARN MORE: IDSA Events & Live Sessions Be our audience Always on the pulse of pioneering trends: Our event for members, decision-makers and expert offer an exclusive platform for dialog, exchange and networking. Check back regularly to stay fully updated! Contact us! Your contact person:Andreas KembueglerHead of Marketing and Communications Take a look back! We have already conducted many live sessions, recorded them and compiled the slides. Emil-Figge-Str. 80 44227 Dortmund, Germany Phone:+49 (0)231 70096 501 2016 2024 | All Rights Reserved | International Data Spaces Association | | | | Follow u Follow u Follow u Follow u Learn more aiXia aiXia" which will be led by LANTEK (digital services) together with the company LIS SOLUTIONS | S.L. (data analytics and ai services) | INGETEAM, S.A.(energy) | GOIZPER S.COOP. (machine-tool industry) | MONDRAGON ASSEMBLY S.COOP. (manufacturing) | UBIKARE ZAINKETAK, S.L. (healthcare) | EROSKI S.COOP (retail) | The technology coordinator is IKERLAN (a leading knowledge transfer center providing competitive value to companies) SUCCESS: Seeks to promote and research the necessary technology for the definition of a reference architecture, operational models, adoption of standard and development for a data space based on the common technical framework proposed by DSBA members, extending it main service to favor the development of artificial intelligence with guarantee of traceability, security, and governance of the data and services. BENEFITS: Aims to provide the country with a reliable data space that enables company to offer new concept of high-added value service based on data sharing, through the servitization of collaborative artificial intelligence for the productization and monetization of their data and industry knowledge in new business models. COMPONENTS: Will develop new service in the field of artificial intelligence and will explore current IDS component implementation (focusing on Connectors, Metadatabroker, and IdentityProviders) in order to select one of them to rely on. LEARN MORE: MONDRAGON ASSEMBLY EGOKIA MONDRAGON ASSEMBLY - an international firm specializing in the development of automatization and assembly solution for various sectors. It operates 6 production plant around the world and is part of the largest cooperative group in the world | IKERLAN Technical research center and member of IDSA CHALLENGE: EGOKIA solution allows collaborative learning and knowledge sharing between geographically distributed plants, integrating headquarters in Basque Country and domain experts. Thanks to the data space, data, and AI asset can be securely shared throughout different corporate site and a new knowledge-based economy emerges. SUCCESS: Deploys an architecture based on IDSA connectors, linking Mondragon Assemblys data and AI platform from different corporate sites. With this new reliable data space, we extend the lifecycle of artificial intelligence models, enhance their capabilities, and facilitate trusted access and use of it asset by EGOKIA participants. BENEFITS: NEW BUSINESS MODEL: A new business model based on AI service and a knowledge-based economy. RELIABLE AI SOLUTIONS: A "standardized", flexible, and secure solution to break data silo to share and complete AI asset and process between trusted organization and production plants. Measurable benefit can be listed as: Up to 30% quality on model thanks to the application of federated learning techniques, reduce inversion and time to market on IA-based solution or lower communication loads. STANDARIZED DATA SPACE The organization is ready to take part in the knowledge economy with other entities, domain experts, and technology providers. COMPONENTS: Data Space connector 8.0.2 Metada Broker 5.0.3 Identity Provider 1.6.0 Gaia-X4KI A sovereign data and service ecosystem for artificial intelligence in automotive development, production, and operation DLR | T-Systems | Capgemini Engineering | Continental | IAV | Intel | Conweaver | HighQSoft | Reuschlaw | STTech | Fraunhofer ITWM | Fraunhofer ISST | Hochschule Offenburg | Leibniz Universitt Hannover | Technische Hochschule Ingolstadt CHALLENGE: Autonomous driving scenario and the industrial production of required device face a broad range of challenge related to data sovereignty and security. In particular, transfer of large, sensitive file and service in a policy-conform way are addressed in the prototypes. SUCCESS: The solution are cloud-based and are embedded in existing industrial cloud landscape to enhance data sovereignty of participant in complex data exchange relations. BENEFITS: Gaia-X4KI connects various stakeholder and their diverse system landscape from the complete autonomous driving development lifecycle. COMPONENTS: Eclipse Dataspace Components (EDC) and EDC MVD including Connector, Federated Catalog, Identity Hub, Registration Service PREREQUISITES: The data space is currently in development and being tested inside the project. It base on open source components. LEARN MORE: Introduction IKERLAN is a leading knowledge transfer technological centre providing competitive value to companies. We seek for excellence in R&D&i, thanks to the continuous adaptation to the need of our customer and the proximity with the business reality. Faithful to our mission, we have been working daily since 1974 to develop solution that allow our customer to become more and more competitive. We are a cooperative member of the MONDRAGON Corporation and the Basque Research and Technology Alliance (BRTA). Business Expertise Thanks to a unique cooperation model, which combine technology transfer activities, internal research and training of highly qualified personnel, IKERLAN is currently the trusted technological partner of major company in the country. To meet our goal, we are structured into two technological specialization units: ELECTRONICS, INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATION TECHNOLOGIES ENERGY AND MECHATRONICS IKERLAN is a center that is dynamic and open to the world. We are an accredited agent of the Basque Network of Science, Technology, and Innovation and of the Spanish Federation of Technology Centres. We have a major cooperation network integrated with renowned European center and universities, with which we conduct activity of research and training of researchers. Technical Expertise Mission: To solve the technological challenge of the companies, improve their competitiveness and collaborate with the sustainable social and economic development of the environment, all of that from a position of technological leadership and with differential ability in their area of expertise. Vission: Technological center, cooperative and non-profit, known a the European leader in it area of specialization, with an exceptional cohesive human team, that provides value to the company and society. Measurable benefit can be listed as: Up to 30% quality on model thanks to the application of federated learning techniques, reduce inversion and time to market on IA-based solution or lower communication loads. STANDARIZED DATA SPACE The organization is ready to take part in the knowledge economy with other entities, domain experts, and technology providers. COMPONENTS: Data Space connector 8.0.2 Metada Broker 5.0.3 Identity Provider 1.6.0 Gaia-X4KI A sovereign data and service ecosystem for artificial intelligence in automotive development, production, and operation DLR | T-Systems | Capgemini Engineering | Continental | IAV | Intel | Conweaver | HighQSoft | Reuschlaw | STTech | Fraunhofer ITWM | Fraunhofer ISST | Hochschule Offenburg | Leibniz Universitt Hannover | Technische Hochschule Ingolstadt CHALLENGE: Autonomous driving scenario and the industrial production of required device face a broad range of challenge related to data sovereignty and security. In particular, transfer of large, sensitive file and service in a policy-conform way are addressed in the prototypes. SUCCESS: The solution are cloud-based and are embedded in existing industrial cloud landscape to enhance data sovereignty of participant in complex data exchange relations. BENEFITS: Gaia-X4KI connects various stakeholder and their diverse system landscape from the complete autonomous driving development lifecycle. COMPONENTS: Eclipse Dataspace Components (EDC) and EDC MVD including Connector, Federated Catalog, Identity Hub, Registration Service PREREQUISITES: The data space is currently in development and being tested inside the project. It base on open source components. LEARN MORE: Introduction IKERLAN is a leading knowledge transfer technological centre providing competitive value to companies. We seek for excellence in R&D&i, thanks to the continuous adaptation to the need of our customer and the proximity with the business reality. Faithful to our mission, we have been working daily since 1974 to develop solution that allow our customer to become more and more competitive. We are a cooperative member of the MONDRAGON Corporation and the Basque Research and Technology Alliance (BRTA). Business Expertise Thanks to a unique cooperation model, which combine technology transfer activities, internal research and training of highly qualified personnel, IKERLAN is currently the trusted technological partner of major company in the country. To meet our goal, we are structured into two technological specialization units: ELECTRONICS, INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATION TECHNOLOGIES ENERGY AND MECHATRONICS IKERLAN is a center that is dynamic and open to the world. We are an accredited agent of the Basque Network of Science, Technology, and Innovation and of the Spanish Federation of Technology Centres. We have a major cooperation network integrated with renowned European center and universities, with which we conduct activity of research and training of researchers. Technical Expertise Mission: To solve the technological challenge of the companies, improve their competitiveness and collaborate with the sustainable social and economic development of the environment, all of that from a position of technological leadership and with differential ability in their area of expertise. Vission: Technological center, cooperative and non-profit, known a the European leader in it area of specialization, with an exceptional cohesive human team, that provides value to the company and society. Contact Details Santiago Charramendieta Website Increased visibility of order delivery process VTT | Wrtsil | Uwira CHALLENGE: The use case revolves around expediting and enhancing transparency between a focal company of a manufacturing ecosystem (OEM) and it supplier in their production order management processes. The existing communication method have proven inadequate in facilitating efficient and adaptable exchange between the two entities. By facilitating transparency and fostering a more seamless integration between the IT system of both companies, the management of product order can be streamlined, resulting in heightened efficiency and a reduction in errors. SUCCESS: The objective is to facilitate a reliable and seamless flow of data between the OEM and it supplier by establishing a dedicated data space. The developed solution will be seamlessly integrated with pre-existing IT infrastructure of both company and the solution is grounded in the framework of the IDS reference architecture. The OEM can selectively disclose data from their production environment to the supplier without the fear of data leakages. Respectively, the supplier receives only the data that are essential for them and there is no need to locally extract meaningful insight and valuable information from big data sets. BENEFITS: The established data space solution ha the potential to significantly enhance transparency between the OEM and the supplier. This give rise to several potential benefits, including: Effective Communication: Transparent communication help in conveying accurate information about product specifications, requirements, changes, and timelines. Risk Management: Sharing information about potential risks, such a change in demand or design modifications, allows supplier to proactively address these issues. Furthermore, in time of disruptions, such a supply shortage or unexpected market shifts, transparent communication help both party respond more effectively. Cost Efficiency: Transparent communication allows both party to work together to find cost-effective solutions. COMPONENTS: IDS connector - serve a the communication interface linking the two company and their existing IT systems. With IDS connectors, a data provider can define the rule and condition (usage policies) under which data are shared with a data consumer. DAPS - enables connector to authenticate themselves using X.509 certificates. After successful authentication, the DAPS issue OAuth2 access token for connectors, who need these token to access the service and data of other connectors. Metadata Broker store information about the data end-points offered by the participants. The broker provides a query interface for connector and can hence be considered a the search engine in this use case. LEARN MORE: Be part of our team Are you looking for variety instead of everyday routine? Team spirit instead of rigid hierarchies? Colleagues, who are just a interested in digital a you are? We offer you a working environment in an association that work agilely like a start-up, but is involved in exciting and influential project such a a corporate group and help shape them. We offer exciting responsible tasks, flexibility, a huge network of expert and international perspectives. Open job We do not have any open job position available at the moment. However, we encourage you to check back on our website regularly for any future job postings. Any questions? Contact us! Your contact person:Susanne ImmelSecretary of the Head Office Our most important document Youll find all of themostmission-critical document and other information about IDSAs work and partner projectshere. Emil-Figge-Str. 80 44227 Dortmund, Germany Phone:+49 (0)231 70096 501 2016 2024 | All Rights Reserved | International Data Spaces Association | | | | Follow u Follow u Follow u Follow u Learn more aiXia aiXia" which will be led by LANTEK (digital services) together with the company LIS SOLUTIONS | S.L. (data analytics and ai services) | INGETEAM, S.A.(energy) | GOIZPER S.COOP. (machine-tool industry) | MONDRAGON ASSEMBLY S.COOP. (manufacturing) | UBIKARE ZAINKETAK, S.L. (healthcare) | EROSKI S.COOP (retail) | The technology coordinator is IKERLAN (a leading knowledge transfer center providing competitive value to companies) SUCCESS: Seeks to promote and research the necessary technology for the definition of a reference architecture, operational models, adoption of standard and development for a data space based on the common technical framework proposed by DSBA members, extending it main service to favor the development of artificial intelligence with guarantee of traceability, security, and governance of the data and services. BENEFITS: Aims to provide the country with a reliable data space that enables company to offer new concept of high-added value service based on data sharing, through the servitization of collaborative artificial intelligence for the productization and monetization of their data and industry knowledge in new business models. COMPONENTS: Will develop new service in the field of artificial intelligence and will explore current IDS component implementation (focusing on Connectors, Metadatabroker, and IdentityProviders) in order to select one of them to rely on. LEARN MORE: MONDRAGON ASSEMBLY EGOKIA MONDRAGON ASSEMBLY - an international firm specializing in the development of automatization and assembly solution for various sectors. It operates 6 production plant around the world and is part of the largest cooperative group in the world | IKERLAN Technical research center and member of IDSA CHALLENGE: EGOKIA solution allows collaborative learning and knowledge sharing between geographically distributed plants, integrating headquarters in Basque Country and domain experts. Thanks to the data space, data, and AI asset can be securely shared throughout different corporate site and a new knowledge-based economy emerges. SUCCESS: Deploys an architecture based on IDSA connectors, linking Mondragon Assemblys data and AI platform from different corporate sites. With this new reliable data space, we extend the lifecycle of artificial intelligence models, enhance their capabilities, and facilitate trusted access and use of it asset by EGOKIA participants. BENEFITS: NEW BUSINESS MODEL: A new business model based on AI service and a knowledge-based economy. RELIABLE AI SOLUTIONS: A "standardized", flexible, and secure solution to break data silo to share and complete AI asset and process between trusted organization and production plants. Measurable benefit can be listed as: Up to 30% quality on model thanks to the application of federated learning techniques, reduce inversion and time to market on IA-based solution or lower communication loads. STANDARIZED DATA SPACE The organization is ready to take part in the knowledge economy with other entities, domain experts, and technology providers. COMPONENTS: Data Space connector 8.0.2 Metada Broker 5.0.3 Identity Provider 1.6.0 Gaia-X4KI A sovereign data and service ecosystem for artificial intelligence in automotive development, production, and operation DLR | T-Systems | Capgemini Engineering | Continental | IAV | Intel | Conweaver | HighQSoft | Reuschlaw | STTech | Fraunhofer ITWM | Fraunhofer ISST | Hochschule Offenburg | Leibniz Universitt Hannover | Technische Hochschule Ingolstadt CHALLENGE: Autonomous driving scenario and the industrial production of required device face a broad range of challenge related to data sovereignty and security. In particular, transfer of large, sensitive file and service in a policy-conform way are addressed in the prototypes. SUCCESS: The solution are cloud-based and are embedded in existing industrial cloud landscape to enhance data sovereignty of participant in complex data exchange relations. BENEFITS: Gaia-X4KI connects various stakeholder and their diverse system landscape from the complete autonomous driving development lifecycle. COMPONENTS: Eclipse Dataspace Components (EDC) and EDC MVD including Connector, Federated Catalog, Identity Hub, Registration Service PREREQUISITES: The data space is currently in development and being tested inside the project. It base on open source components. LEARN MORE: Introduction IKERLAN is a leading knowledge transfer technological centre providing competitive value to companies. We seek for excellence in R&D&i, thanks to the continuous adaptation to the need of our customer and the proximity with the business reality. Faithful to our mission, we have been working daily since 1974 to develop solution that allow our customer to become more and more competitive. We are a cooperative member of the MONDRAGON Corporation and the Basque Research and Technology Alliance (BRTA). Business Expertise Thanks to a unique cooperation model, which combine technology transfer activities, internal research and training of highly qualified personnel, IKERLAN is currently the trusted technological partner of major company in the country. To meet our goal, we are structured into two technological specialization units: ELECTRONICS, INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATION TECHNOLOGIES ENERGY AND MECHATRONICS IKERLAN is a center that is dynamic and open to the world. We are an accredited agent of the Basque Network of Science, Technology, and Innovation and of the Spanish Federation of Technology Centres. We have a major cooperation network integrated with renowned European center and universities, with which we conduct activity of research and training of researchers. Technical Expertise Mission: To solve the technological challenge of the companies, improve their competitiveness and collaborate with the sustainable social and economic development of the environment, all of that from a position of technological leadership and with differential ability in their area of expertise. Vission: Technological center, cooperative and non-profit, known a the European leader in it area of specialization, with an exceptional cohesive human team, that provides value to the company and society. Contact Details Santiago Charramendieta Website Increased visibility of order delivery process VTT | Wrtsil | Uwira CHALLENGE: The use case revolves around expediting and enhancing transparency between a focal company of a manufacturing ecosystem (OEM) and it supplier in their production order management processes. The existing communication method have proven inadequate in facilitating efficient and adaptable exchange between the two entities. By facilitating transparency and fostering a more seamless integration between the IT system of both companies, the management of product order can be streamlined, resulting in heightened efficiency and a reduction in errors. The developed solution will be seamlessly integrated with pre-existing IT infrastructure of both company and the solution is grounded in the framework of the IDS reference architecture. The OEM can selectively disclose data from their production environment to the supplier without the fear of data leakages. Respectively, the supplier receives only the data that are essential for them and there is no need to locally extract meaningful insight and valuable information from big data sets. BENEFITS: The established data space solution ha the potential to significantly enhance transparency between the OEM and the supplier. This give rise to several potential benefits, including: Effective Communication: Transparent communication help in conveying accurate information about product specifications, requirements, changes, and timelines. With IDS connectors, a data provider can define the rule and condition (usage policies) under which data are shared with a data consumer. DAPS - enables connector to authenticate themselves using X.509 certificates. After successful authentication, the DAPS issue OAuth2 access token for connectors, who need these token to access the service and data of other connectors. Metadata Broker store information about the data end-points offered by the participants. The broker provides a query interface for connector and can hence be considered a the search engine in this use case. LEARN MORE: Newsletter Registration Its a data space world! By car: From the north: Take the A40/B1 to the Dortmund-Dorstfeld/Universitt exit. At the end of the exit (traffic lights), turn right into Wittener Str. and go straight over the next set of traffic light into Hauert. Now get into the left lane and at the next intersection (traffic light) turn left into Emil-Figge-Str.. After 300m you will find the building Emil-Figge-Str. 80 on the right side of the street. From the south: Take the A45 to the Dortmund-Eichlinghofen/Universitt exit. At the end of the exit, turn right into Universittsstr., go straight through the next set of traffic lights, then get into the left lane and turn into Hauert. Follow Hauert straight on until the second set of traffic lights, then turn right into Emil-Figge-Str. After 300m you will find the building Emil-Figge-Str. 80 on the right side of the street. From the west and east: Take the A44/A40/B1 to the Dortmund-Dorstfeld/Universitt exit. At the end of the exit (traffic lights), turn right into Wittener Str. and go straight ahead at the next set of traffic light into Hauert. Immediately get into the left lane and at the next intersection (traffic light) turn left into Emil-Figge-Str. After 300m you will find the building Emil-Figge-Str. 80 on the right side of the street. Transportation:S1 from Dortmund HBF in the direction of Bochum. Get off at the stop University / Universitt and change directly to the H-Bahn in the direction of Technologiepark. The H-Bahn stop a few meter from the building. Parking lot: There is an underground parking lot at the Martin Schmeier Weg on the right-hand side of the building. Postal code and city Subject Message By setting the check mark I declare that my registered personal data is electronically processed and saved for the purpose of processing of my inquiry I am free to cancel this agreement at any time by mean of a message to info@internationaldataspaces.org. For more information please see our data privacy statement. * Submit Head Office International Data Spaces e. V. After successful authentication, the DAPS issue OAuth2 access token for connectors, who need these token to access the service and data of other connectors. Metadata Broker store information about the data end-points offered by the participants. The broker provides a query interface for connector and can hence be considered a the search engine in this use case. LEARN MORE: Calendar Broaden your horizon IDSA regularly sponsor events, roundtable and workshop related to building the data economy of the future. Stay up to date on when theyre happening and how to join here. Calendar Stay updated with u Share this page: International Data Spaces e. V. (data analytics and ai services) | INGETEAM, S.A.(energy) | GOIZPER S.COOP. (machine-tool industry) | MONDRAGON ASSEMBLY S.COOP. (manufacturing) | UBIKARE ZAINKETAK, S.L. (healthcare) | EROSKI S.COOP (retail) | The technology coordinator is IKERLAN (a leading knowledge transfer center providing competitive value to companies) SUCCESS: Seeks to promote and research the necessary technology for the definition of a reference architecture, operational models, adoption of standard and development for a data space based on the common technical framework proposed by DSBA members, extending it main service to favor the development of artificial intelligence with guarantee of traceability, security, and governance of the data and services. BENEFITS: Aims to provide the country with a reliable data space that enables company to offer new concept of high-added value service based on data sharing, through the servitization of collaborative artificial intelligence for the productization and monetization of their data and industry knowledge in new business models. COMPONENTS: Will develop new service in the field of artificial intelligence and will explore current IDS component implementation (focusing on Connectors, Metadatabroker, and IdentityProviders) in order to select one of them to rely on. LEARN MORE: MONDRAGON ASSEMBLY EGOKIA MONDRAGON ASSEMBLY - an international firm specializing in the development of automatization and assembly solution for various sectors. It operates 6 production plant around the world and is part of the largest cooperative group in the world | IKERLAN Technical research center and member of IDSA CHALLENGE: EGOKIA solution allows collaborative learning and knowledge sharing between geographically distributed plants, integrating headquarters in Basque Country and domain experts. Thanks to the data space, data, and AI asset can be securely shared throughout different corporate site and a new knowledge-based economy emerges. SUCCESS: Deploys an architecture based on IDSA connectors, linking Mondragon Assemblys data and AI platform from different corporate sites. With this new reliable data space, we extend the lifecycle of artificial intelligence models, enhance their capabilities, and facilitate trusted access and use of it asset by EGOKIA participants. BENEFITS: NEW BUSINESS MODEL: A new business model based on AI service and a knowledge-based economy. RELIABLE AI SOLUTIONS: A "standardized", flexible, and secure solution to break data silo to share and complete AI asset and process between trusted organization and production plants. Measurable benefit can be listed as: Up to 30% quality on model thanks to the application of federated learning techniques, reduce inversion and time to market on IA-based solution or lower communication loads. STANDARIZED DATA SPACE The organization is ready to take part in the knowledge economy with other entities, domain experts, and technology providers. COMPONENTS: Data Space connector 8.0.2 Metada Broker 5.0.3 Identity Provider 1.6.0 Gaia-X4KI A sovereign data and service ecosystem for artificial intelligence in automotive development, production, and operation DLR | T-Systems | Capgemini Engineering | Continental | IAV | Intel | Conweaver | HighQSoft | Reuschlaw | STTech | Fraunhofer ITWM | Fraunhofer ISST | Hochschule Offenburg | Leibniz Universitt Hannover | Technische Hochschule Ingolstadt CHALLENGE: Autonomous driving scenario and the industrial production of required device face a broad range of challenge related to data sovereignty and security. In particular, transfer of large, sensitive file and service in a policy-conform way are addressed in the prototypes. SUCCESS: The solution are cloud-based and are embedded in existing industrial cloud landscape to enhance data sovereignty of participant in complex data exchange relations. BENEFITS: Gaia-X4KI connects various stakeholder and their diverse system landscape from the complete autonomous driving development lifecycle. COMPONENTS: Eclipse Dataspace Components (EDC) and EDC MVD including Connector, Federated Catalog, Identity Hub, Registration Service PREREQUISITES: The data space is currently in development and being tested inside the project. It base on open source components. LEARN MORE: Introduction IKERLAN is a leading knowledge transfer technological centre providing competitive value to companies. We seek for excellence in R&D&i, thanks to the continuous adaptation to the need of our customer and the proximity with the business reality. Faithful to our mission, we have been working daily since 1974 to develop solution that allow our customer to become more and more competitive. We are a cooperative member of the MONDRAGON Corporation and the Basque Research and Technology Alliance (BRTA). Business Expertise Thanks to a unique cooperation model, which combine technology transfer activities, internal research and training of highly qualified personnel, IKERLAN is currently the trusted technological partner of major company in the country. To meet our goal, we are structured into two technological specialization units: ELECTRONICS, INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATION TECHNOLOGIES ENERGY AND MECHATRONICS IKERLAN is a center that is dynamic and open to the world. We are an accredited agent of the Basque Network of Science, Technology, and Innovation and of the Spanish Federation of Technology Centres. We have a major cooperation network integrated with renowned European center and universities, with which we conduct activity of research and training of researchers. Technical Expertise Mission: To solve the technological challenge of the companies, improve their competitiveness and collaborate with the sustainable social and economic development of the environment, all of that from a position of technological leadership and with differential ability in their area of expertise. Vission: Technological center, cooperative and non-profit, known a the European leader in it area of specialization, with an exceptional cohesive human team, that provides value to the company and society. Contact Details Santiago Charramendieta Website Increased visibility of order delivery process VTT | Wrtsil | Uwira CHALLENGE: The use case revolves around expediting and enhancing transparency between a focal company of a manufacturing ecosystem (OEM) and it supplier in their production order management processes. The existing communication method have proven inadequate in facilitating efficient and adaptable exchange between the two entities. By facilitating transparency and fostering a more seamless integration between the IT system of both companies, the management of product order can be streamlined, resulting in heightened efficiency and a reduction in errors. SUCCESS: The objective is to facilitate a reliable and seamless flow of data between the OEM and it supplier by establishing a dedicated data space. The developed solution will be seamlessly integrated with pre-existing IT infrastructure of both company and the solution is grounded in the framework of the IDS reference architecture. The OEM can selectively disclose data from their production environment to the supplier without the fear of data leakages. Respectively, the supplier receives only the data that are essential for them and there is no need to locally extract meaningful insight and valuable information from big data sets. BENEFITS: The established data space solution ha the potential to significantly enhance transparency between the OEM and the supplier. This give rise to several potential benefits, including: Effective Communication: Transparent communication help in conveying accurate information about product specifications, requirements, changes, and timelines. Risk Management: Sharing information about potential risks, such a change in demand or design modifications, allows supplier to proactively address these issues. Furthermore, in time of disruptions, such a supply shortage or unexpected market shifts, transparent communication help both party respond more effectively. Cost Efficiency: Transparent communication allows both party to work together to find cost-effective solutions. COMPONENTS: IDS connector - serve a the communication interface linking the two company and their existing IT systems. With IDS connectors, a data provider can define the rule and condition (usage policies) under which data are shared with a data consumer. DAPS - enables connector to authenticate themselves using X.509 certificates. After successful authentication, the DAPS issue OAuth2 access token for connectors, who need these token to access the service and data of other connectors. Metadata Broker store information about the data end-points offered by the participants. The broker provides a query interface for connector and can hence be considered a the search engine in this use case. LEARN MORE: Our mission and vision IDSA is on a mission to create a digital future in which all player can realize the full value of their data through equal access to secure and sovereign data sharing among trusted partners. Our mission and vision It is time to change the way data is shared. We want to pave the way for a data economy in which every company and every person keep full control over their data treasures. We believe in a data economy in which you do not rely on a solution that is owned by one big player. This is why we create the required standard for data space which grant data sovereignty to all participant to share data without regret. Our mission is to advance the IDS standard and drive innovation, awareness and global adoption of data space to ensure data sovereignty, meaning staying in control of access and usage of your data, for all participants. Data Sovereignty IDSA aim toenable people, organizations, and government to have control over their data, including collecting, storing, sharing, and use. This mean making rule for data sharing and use, like data policy and contracts, with varying level of control. We call thisdata sovereignty. IDSA offer guideline and a framework for ensuring data sovereignty in data spaces. Data Spaces Our vision depends ondata space which comprise relationship between trusted partner that are governed by IDSA standard for secure and sovereign data sharing, certification and governance for business and industry across Europe and around the world. International standard We aim to create international standard for data spaces, a well a fostering technology and business model that will drive the data economy.Our standardization effort are fueled by the IDSA member and technical staff commitment, who actively shape and lead the development of data spaces. Central to these effort are the IDS Reference Architecture Model, the IDSA Rulebook, and the Dataspace Protocol. IDSA is transforming the data economy and realizes it promises, advocating for a world where every individual and organization retains control over their data. Our goal is to drive innovation, awareness, and global adoption of International Data Spaces (IDS), creating guideline that guarantee data sovereignty for all participants. Lars Nagel, CEO, IDSA Any questions? Contact us! No website or brochure can replace a personal conversation about your goal and your topics. Our team is looking forward to your call!Phone: +49 (0) 231 70096 501 Download our brochure Read our brochure: International Data Spaces trustworthy and sovereign data sharing enable the data economy Why Stay updated with u Share this page: International Data Spaces e. The broker provides a query interface for connector and can hence be considered a the search engine in this use case. LEARN MORE: Data Sovereignty Youdecide howyour data get used! What is data sovereignty? Today, organization of all type and size collect and store huge amount of every kind of data. IDSA enables you to self-determine how and when others may use it across the value chain. We call this data sovereignty. Why doe this matter? Control over data Data sovereignty ensures that organizations, governments, and individual have control over their data. This control allows them to self-determine how their data is collected, stored, shared, and used by others. Data sovereignty is a spectrum; it about finding the right balance between keeping data safe and sharing it to gain added value. Innovation and trust In a data-driven economy, trust is essential for fostering innovation and encouraging participation in data-sharing ecosystems. By establishing data sovereignty and enforcing rule for data management, such a data usage policy and contracts, organization can create an environment of trust and reliability. When participant feel confident that their data is handled securely and self-determined, they are more likely to engage in collaborative initiatives, leading to innovation, knowledge sharing, and economic growth. Interoperability and collaboration Data sovereignty promotes interoperability among participant in data spaces. By adhering to common technical standards, organization can share data seamlessly and collaborate effectively across different platform and domains. The growing number of industrial cloud platform and the heterogeneity of the platform landscape underscore the need for data sovereignty standard to ensure secure and trusted data exchange between different platforms. More Brochure Read our brochure: International Data Spaces trustworthy and sovereign data sharing enable the data economy Data Spaces Radar Discover the Data Spaces Radar and learn how data sovereignty is put into practice. International standard Learn more about our standardization activity at a global level. Any questions? Contact us! LEARN MORE: Data Spaces Where the future of data happens Our vision depends on data space which comprise relationship between trusted partner that are governed by the IDSA standard for secure and sovereign data exchange, certification and governance for business and industry across Europe and around the world. The basis for fruitful collaboration Companies hold vast amount of valuable data that they have been unable to safeguard, share or monetize. The IDSA standard enables data sharing through data space characterized by uniform rules, certified data provider and recipient and trust among partners. Data space provide the basis for fruitful cooperation, lowered barrier to entry and limitless innovation in the data economy of the future. That future truly arrives when more company implement IDS a their preferred mode of data exchange and when official standard and governance body adopt it a the binding global standard. Discover the data space component by mouseover: More IDSA Rulebook Learn how the IDSA Rulebook support the development and operation of data spaces. IDS RAM Get insight into secure and trusted data sharing in business ecosystems. Dataspace Protocol Get an overview of the Dataspace Protocol Any questions? Contact us! In particular, transfer of large, sensitive file and service in a policy-conform way are addressed in the prototypes. SUCCESS: The solution are cloud-based and are embedded in existing industrial cloud landscape to enhance data sovereignty of participant in complex data exchange relations. BENEFITS: Gaia-X4KI connects various stakeholder and their diverse system landscape from the complete autonomous driving development lifecycle. COMPONENTS: Eclipse Dataspace Components (EDC) and EDC MVD including Connector, Federated Catalog, Identity Hub, Registration Service PREREQUISITES: The data space is currently in development and being tested inside the project. It base on open source components. LEARN MORE: Introduction IKERLAN is a leading knowledge transfer technological centre providing competitive value to companies. We seek for excellence in R&D&i, thanks to the continuous adaptation to the need of our customer and the proximity with the business reality. Faithful to our mission, we have been working daily since 1974 to develop solution that allow our customer to become more and more competitive. We are a cooperative member of the MONDRAGON Corporation and the Basque Research and Technology Alliance (BRTA). Business Expertise Thanks to a unique cooperation model, which combine technology transfer activities, internal research and training of highly qualified personnel, IKERLAN is currently the trusted technological partner of major company in the country. To meet our goal, we are structured into two technological specialization units: ELECTRONICS, INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATION TECHNOLOGIES ENERGY AND MECHATRONICS IKERLAN is a center that is dynamic and open to the world. We are an accredited agent of the Basque Network of Science, Technology, and Innovation and of the Spanish Federation of Technology Centres. We have a major cooperation network integrated with renowned European center and universities, with which we conduct activity of research and training of researchers. Technical Expertise Mission: To solve the technological challenge of the companies, improve their competitiveness and collaborate with the sustainable social and economic development of the environment, all of that from a position of technological leadership and with differential ability in their area of expertise. Vission: Technological center, cooperative and non-profit, known a the European leader in it area of specialization, with an exceptional cohesive human team, that provides value to the company and society. Contact Details Santiago Charramendieta Website Increased visibility of order delivery process VTT | Wrtsil | Uwira CHALLENGE: The use case revolves around expediting and enhancing transparency between a focal company of a manufacturing ecosystem (OEM) and it supplier in their production order management processes. The existing communication method have proven inadequate in facilitating efficient and adaptable exchange between the two entities. By facilitating transparency and fostering a more seamless integration between the IT system of both companies, the management of product order can be streamlined, resulting in heightened efficiency and a reduction in errors. SUCCESS: The objective is to facilitate a reliable and seamless flow of data between the OEM and it supplier by establishing a dedicated data space. The developed solution will be seamlessly integrated with pre-existing IT infrastructure of both company and the solution is grounded in the framework of the IDS reference architecture. The OEM can selectively disclose data from their production environment to the supplier without the fear of data leakages. Respectively, the supplier receives only the data that are essential for them and there is no need to locally extract meaningful insight and valuable information from big data sets. BENEFITS: The established data space solution ha the potential to significantly enhance transparency between the OEM and the supplier. This give rise to several potential benefits, including: Effective Communication: Transparent communication help in conveying accurate information about product specifications, requirements, changes, and timelines. Risk Management: Sharing information about potential risks, such a change in demand or design modifications, allows supplier to proactively address these issues. Furthermore, in time of disruptions, such a supply shortage or unexpected market shifts, transparent communication help both party respond more effectively. Cost Efficiency: Transparent communication allows both party to work together to find cost-effective solutions. COMPONENTS: IDS connector - serve a the communication interface linking the two company and their existing IT systems. With IDS connectors, a data provider can define the rule and condition (usage policies) under which data are shared with a data consumer. DAPS - enables connector to authenticate themselves using X.509 certificates. After successful authentication, the DAPS issue OAuth2 access token for connectors, who need these token to access the service and data of other connectors. Metadata Broker store information about the data end-points offered by the participants. The broker provides a query interface for connector and can hence be considered a the search engine in this use case. LEARN MORE: International Standards Worldwide access, European principle Our vision for shaping the future data economy requires international standard for data spaces. Such standard are crucial for enabling sovereign and trustworthy data sharing, a demanded by European stakeholders, and are essential for ensuring interoperability across the global landscape. Standardization the key to interoperability Standardization is crucial for global exchange because it enables interoperability, reduces technical barriers, and enhances trade. It help business reduce costs, enter global markets, and ensure quality product for consumers. It facilitates innovation, minimizes R&D risks, and support environmental protection. Additionally, it allows company to influence regulation and stay competitive by adapting to market trends. Given the established position of IDS a de facto standards, it is vital to improve go-to-market strategy and increase maturity by aligning IDSA asset with relevant standardization bodies. This effort is at the forefront of everything we do at IDSA. Our members, the IDSA working group and the standardization coordination group, a well a the IDSA technical team, work diligently with key body at ISO, CEN/CENELEC and W3C and advise the European Commission on advancing global standard for data spaces. IDSA engagement in European and International Standardization body How it all come together Our standardization effort are fueled by the IDSA member and technical staff commitment, who actively participate in standard committee to shape and lead the development of data spaces. Central to these effort are the IDS Reference Architecture Model, the IDSA Rulebook, and the Dataspace Protocol, which are key in setting technical specification and fostering interoperability. Eclipse Foundation new working group on data space In collaboration with the Eclipse Foundation, weve launched the Eclipse Dataspace Working Group (EDWG) to spearhead the creation of open-source software, component and specification for data spaces. This partnership accelerates the development of the Dataspace Protocol (DSP), aiming to establish it a an ISO Standard and enhance global data sharing and sovereignty. The EDWG aligns technical effort with universal standards, leveraging global developer network to ensure interoperability and trust in data spaces. ISO, IEEE, CEN/CENELEC international & European standardization activity On the international front, initiative like IEEE P3800 and various ISO JTC1 activity underscore the growing importance of data space in global standardization, requiring collaboration across sectors. In Europe, the focus is on aligning with regulation such a the Digital Markets Act and the Data Governance Act, with collaborative effort in CEN/CENELEC addressing the region specific need through initiative like the Data, Dataspaces, Cloud and Edge Focus Group, aiming to harmonize standard across the digital economy. European Commission regulation state of the art The European Commission (EC), through the Multi-Stakeholder Platform on ICT Standardization and the Data Spaces Support Centre (DSSC), work to align EU policy priority with standardization efforts. IDSAs contribution to data interoperability and the Dataspace Protocol are integrated into broader regulatory and standardization frameworks. More IDSA Rulebook Learn how the IDSA Rulebook support the development and operation of data spaces. IDS RAM Get insight into secure and trusted data sharing in business ecosystems. Dataspace Protocol Get an overview of the Dataspace Protocol Any questions? Contact us! Your contact person:Silvia CastellviDirector Research & Standardization Become a member Benefit from all current developments: Become a member of the International Data Spaces Association now! (data analytics and ai services) | INGETEAM, S.A.(energy) | GOIZPER S.COOP. (machine-tool industry) | MONDRAGON ASSEMBLY S.COOP. (manufacturing) | UBIKARE ZAINKETAK, S.L. (healthcare) | EROSKI S.COOP (retail) | The technology coordinator is IKERLAN (a leading knowledge transfer center providing competitive value to companies) SUCCESS: Seeks to promote and research the necessary technology for the definition of a reference architecture, operational models, adoption of standard and development for a data space based on the common technical framework proposed by DSBA members, extending it main service to favor the development of artificial intelligence with guarantee of traceability, security, and governance of the data and services. BENEFITS: Aims to provide the country with a reliable data space that enables company to offer new concept of high-added value service based on data sharing, through the servitization of collaborative artificial intelligence for the productization and monetization of their data and industry knowledge in new business models. COMPONENTS: Will develop new service in the field of artificial intelligence and will explore current IDS component implementation (focusing on Connectors, Metadatabroker, and IdentityProviders) in order to select one of them to rely on. LEARN MORE: MONDRAGON ASSEMBLY EGOKIA MONDRAGON ASSEMBLY - an international firm specializing in the development of automatization and assembly solution for various sectors. It operates 6 production plant around the world and is part of the largest cooperative group in the world | IKERLAN Technical research center and member of IDSA CHALLENGE: EGOKIA solution allows collaborative learning and knowledge sharing between geographically distributed plants, integrating headquarters in Basque Country and domain experts. Thanks to the data space, data, and AI asset can be securely shared throughout different corporate site and a new knowledge-based economy emerges. SUCCESS: Deploys an architecture based on IDSA connectors, linking Mondragon Assemblys data and AI platform from different corporate sites. With this new reliable data space, we extend the lifecycle of artificial intelligence models, enhance their capabilities, and facilitate trusted access and use of it asset by EGOKIA participants. BENEFITS: NEW BUSINESS MODEL: A new business model based on AI service and a knowledge-based economy. RELIABLE AI SOLUTIONS: A "standardized", flexible, and secure solution to break data silo to share and complete AI asset and process between trusted organization and production plants. Measurable benefit can be listed as: Up to 30% quality on model thanks to the application of federated learning techniques, reduce inversion and time to market on IA-based solution or lower communication loads. LEARN MORE: Innovating the future of data exchange in Europe and beyond We are more than 140 organization innovator across industry who share a vision of a world where data provider enjoy true data sovereignty and realize the full value of their data in secure, trusted, equal partnerships. We are working together to make this vision a reality. The association Weve brought together companies, scientists, lawmaker and all other relevant stakeholder in an open, not-for-profit coalition to create the all-important technical standard that will make this future economy possible. Join the more than 140 member organization that are working together to drive a new vision for a global, digital future in Europe and worldwide. Our member International data space could never happen without the concerted collaboration ofallmembers. TheyareIDSA, steering our steering committee, leading working group and task forces, heading our community and adoption initiative and playingkey role in theorganizationitself. IDSA ambassador Our Ambassador program is a gathering point for data space enthusiast and experts. Each of our ambassador will help u promote the understanding of data spaces, demonstrate their potential, and inspire new participant in a collaborative way, reshaping the data economy for the better. BoardIDSAs secure, cross-sector solution for global data sharing is built not only on a strong technical foundation, but also on a rock-solid foundation of leadership, with an executive board of top business and science leader drawn from multiple industry and perspectives. Head officeInternational data space may be virtual, but IDSAs head office is a real placewhereessential operation take place and where you can find your contact partners.Werelocated at theTechnologieZentrum Dortmund. With the founding of the International Data Spaces Association, the business and research community are actively participating in the design of a trusted architecture for the data economy. The goal of the IDSA is to ensure data sovereignty through an open architecture for peer-to-peer network that enables usage control of data from all sectors. Thorsten Hlsmann, CFO, IDSA Any questions? Contact us! No website or brochure can replace a personal conversation about your goal and your topics. Our team is looking forward to your call! LEARN MORE: Become a Member Our member are the lifeblood of our work To be successful in creating global, cross-industry data ecosystems, IDSA need the involvement of company of all size and sectors. This mean you! We hope youll consider joining the effort to drive the data economy of the future. What is our vision & mission? IDSA is an alliance of more than 140 member that share thevision of a world in which every company and every person keep full control over their data treasures. We believe in a data economy in which you do not rely on a solution that is owned by one big player. This is why we create the required standard for data spaces, which grant data sovereignty to all participant to share data without regret. Our mission is to advance the IDS standard and drive innovation, awareness and global adoption of data space to ensure data sovereignty, meaning staying in control of access and usage of your data, for all participants. Join the data space pioneer IDSA membership brochure | March 2024 Whats in it for you? Your involvement will put you at the forefront of shaping the future and gaining early access to IDS concept and technology. Be part of the community: Learn from the best and benefit from their expertise. Co-create the future data economy: Join our working group and task force to contribute to the development of the IDS standard. Amplify your success stories: Be part of our events, benefit from articles, social medium promotion, and medium visibility. How can you get involved? Below youll find all the information and form needed to apply for membership. Or contact u with any questions. Fill out our membership application and send it to u via our contact form, email, or postal mail. Welcome aboard! Our team at the head office will personally guide you through the process, ensuring you get the most out of your involvement with the IDSA community. Together, we can make a flourishing data future a reality. We seek for excellence in R&D&i, thanks to the continuous adaptation to the need of our customer and the proximity with the business reality. Faithful to our mission, we have been working daily since 1974 to develop solution that allow our customer to become more and more competitive. We are a cooperative member of the MONDRAGON Corporation and the Basque Research and Technology Alliance (BRTA). Business Expertise Thanks to a unique cooperation model, which combine technology transfer activities, internal research and training of highly qualified personnel, IKERLAN is currently the trusted technological partner of major company in the country. To meet our goal, we are structured into two technological specialization units: ELECTRONICS, INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATION TECHNOLOGIES ENERGY AND MECHATRONICS IKERLAN is a center that is dynamic and open to the world. We are an accredited agent of the Basque Network of Science, Technology, and Innovation and of the Spanish Federation of Technology Centres. We have a major cooperation network integrated with renowned European center and universities, with which we conduct activity of research and training of researchers. Technical Expertise Mission: To solve the technological challenge of the companies, improve their competitiveness and collaborate with the sustainable social and economic development of the environment, all of that from a position of technological leadership and with differential ability in their area of expertise. Vission: Technological center, cooperative and non-profit, known a the European leader in it area of specialization, with an exceptional cohesive human team, that provides value to the company and society. Contact Details Santiago Charramendieta Website Increased visibility of order delivery process VTT | Wrtsil | Uwira CHALLENGE: The use case revolves around expediting and enhancing transparency between a focal company of a manufacturing ecosystem (OEM) and it supplier in their production order management processes. The existing communication method have proven inadequate in facilitating efficient and adaptable exchange between the two entities. By facilitating transparency and fostering a more seamless integration between the IT system of both companies, the management of product order can be streamlined, resulting in heightened efficiency and a reduction in errors. SUCCESS: The objective is to facilitate a reliable and seamless flow of data between the OEM and it supplier by establishing a dedicated data space. The developed solution will be seamlessly integrated with pre-existing IT infrastructure of both company and the solution is grounded in the framework of the IDS reference architecture. The OEM can selectively disclose data from their production environment to the supplier without the fear of data leakages. Respectively, the supplier receives only the data that are essential for them and there is no need to locally extract meaningful insight and valuable information from big data sets. BENEFITS: The established data space solution ha the potential to significantly enhance transparency between the OEM and the supplier. This give rise to several potential benefits, including: Effective Communication: Transparent communication help in conveying accurate information about product specifications, requirements, changes, and timelines. Risk Management: Sharing information about potential risks, such a change in demand or design modifications, allows supplier to proactively address these issues. Furthermore, in time of disruptions, such a supply shortage or unexpected market shifts, transparent communication help both party respond more effectively. Cost Efficiency: Transparent communication allows both party to work together to find cost-effective solutions. COMPONENTS: IDS connector - serve a the communication interface linking the two company and their existing IT systems. With IDS connectors, a data provider can define the rule and condition (usage policies) under which data are shared with a data consumer. DAPS - enables connector to authenticate themselves using X.509 certificates. After successful authentication, the DAPS issue OAuth2 access token for connectors, who need these token to access the service and data of other connectors. Metadata Broker store information about the data end-points offered by the participants. The broker provides a query interface for connector and can hence be considered a the search engine in this use case. LEARN MORE: Members Our member are the backbone of IDSA International data space could never happen without the concerted collaboration of all members, drawn from across virtually every major industry. Additionally, there are renowned software company and research institution collaborating with us. Our member are IDSA: They steer our steering committee, lead working group and task forces, head our community and adoption initiative and play key role in the organization itself. Our member Learn more about them below. But keep in mind, the number of logo on display here is not going to be 100 percent up to date because our membership is always growing. Any questions? Contact us! Become a member Benefit from all current developments: Become a member of the International Data Spaces Association now!
